meanings.definition: The activity of making decorative objects by hand.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys creating handcrafts in her spare time.
meanings.sent2: The artisan's shop is filled with beautiful handcrafts.
meanings.sent3: The handcrafts fair was a big success, with many unique items for sale.
meanings.sent4: Her handcrafts were like little pieces of art, each one carefully crafted.
meanings.sent5: The intricate handcrafts displayed great skill and creativity.

meanings.sent1: The market was full of handcrafts from different cultures.
meanings.sent2: She collected handcrafts from all over the world.
meanings.sent3: The handcrafts store had a wide variety of handmade items.
meanings.sent4: Each of the handcrafts told a story of its creator.
meanings.sent5: The handcrafts on display were a testament to human creativity.

meanings.sent1: She handcrafts jewelry using beads and wire.
meanings.sent2: He handcrafts wooden furniture in his workshop.
meanings.sent3: The children decided to handcraft gifts for their parents.

meanings.sent5: Handcrafting a quilt requires patience and precision.
